Dataset CLI¶

The pre-processing of data sets in this project is done with the help of a CLI which provides the following functionality:

  1. (Downloading of data sets not available for all data sets)

  2. Pre-processing of data

  3. Indexing of data

  4. Splitting of the data set into train, test and validation split

The structure of the CLI (dataset_app.py) is as follows:
  • index

    • index-csv

  • pre_process

    • movielens

    • yoochoose

    • amazon

  • split

    • next-item

    • ratios

  • vocabulary

    • build

  • popularity

    • build

Usage¶

python main.py [OPTIONS] COMMAND [ARGS]...

Possible commands and sub-commands are listed above.

For example to generate the MovieLens 1m dataset, execute the following command:

python main.py pre_process movielens ml-1m

Packaging¶

In the future it might be interesting to look at how this could be packaged using poetry (https://typer.tiangolo.com/tutorial/package/).
